drug.name: Squalamine

article.citation: Williams JI, Weitman S, Gonzalez CM, Jundt CH, Marty J, Stringer SD, Holroyd KJ, Mclane MP, Chen Q, Zasloff M, Von Hoff DD: Squalamine treatment of human tumors in nu/nu mice enhances platinum-based chemotherapies. Clin Cancer Res. 2001 Mar;7(3):724-33.

drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in ovarian cancer, lung cancer, and macular degeneration.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as monohydroxy bile acids, alcohols and derivatives. These are bile acids, alcohols or any of their derivatives bearing a hydroxyl group.
classification.direct-parent: Monohydroxy bile acids, alcohols and derivatives
classification.substituent: Monohydroxy bile acid, alcohol, or derivatives

category.category: Compounds used in a research, industrial, or household setting

drug-interaction.name: Darbepoetin alfa
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Squalamine.

drug-interaction.name: Erythropoietin
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Squalamine.

drug-interaction.name: Peginesatide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Squalamine.

drug-interaction.name: Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta is combined with Squalamine.

drug-interaction.name: Picosulfuric acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine.

drug-interaction.name: Pamidronic acid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti-angiogenesis can be increased when Squalamine is combined with Pamidronic acid.

drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Squalamine.
